channel.title: Adding Curses Command

item.title: Adding Curses Command
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Silly me. I haven’t used PI in forever. So forgive me for all the mistakes.

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("curses")) { if (c.pkPoints > 199) { c.altarPrayed = (c.altarPrayed == 0) ? 1 : 0; c.setSidebarInterface(5, ((c.altarPrayed == 0) ? 5608 : 22500)); c.pkPoints -= 200; c.sendMessage("You lose 200 pk points for switching your curses."); } else { c.sendMessage("You need at least 200 pk points to do this."); return; } }[/quote]
Yay! it worked! i really appreciate it and hey can u make me a command where if they want to switch to the regular prayer book it sends them to it? cause i just tried switching and it made me pay another 200 pk points.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Curses Command
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

public void setSidebarInterface(int menuId, int form) {
	//synchronized (this) {
		if(getOutStream() != null) {
			outStream.createFrame(71);
			outStream.writeWord(form);
			outStream.writeByteA(menuId);
		//}
	}
}

In client.java

item.title: Adding Curses Command
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=485780.msg3559569#msg3559569 date=1302146894]

[quote author=i0wn3v3ry link=topic=485780.msg3559564#msg3559564 date=1302146508]
You need to add the interface ID for the curse prayer…
[/quote]ahaha, I knew I wasn’t doing something right.

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("curses")) { if (c.pkPoints > 199) { c.altarPrayed = (c.altarPrayed == 0) ? 1 : 0; setSidebarInterface(5, ((c.altarPrayed == 0) ? 5608 : 22500)); c.pkPoints -= 200; c.sendMessage("You lose 200 pk points for switching your curses."); } else { c.sendMessage("You need at least 200 pk points to do this."); return; } }I wanted to try ternary again… If it doesn’t work, use this.

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("curses")) { if (c.pkPoints > 199) { if (c.altarPrayed == 1) { c.altarPrayed = 0; setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); } else if (c.altarPrayed == 0) { c.altarPrayed = 1; setSidebarInterface(5, 22500); } c.pkPoints -= 200; c.sendMessage("You lose 200 pk points for switching your curses."); } else { c.sendMessage("You need at least 200 pk points to do this."); return; } }
[/quote][/quote]
i get this error now:
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:92: cannot find symbol
symbol : method setSidebarInterface(int,int)
location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands
setSidebarInterface(5, ((c.altarPrayed == 0) ? 5608 : 22500));
^
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .
Thats from the first one that you suggested and i get 2 errors when i do the second one.

Read full topic

item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

i0wn3v3ry:

If you have the interface client sided, you simply need to add the interface ID into your command, where it changes your regular prayer book, to your curse prayer book.

Where would i find the interface id like what would i look for? sorry im new to coding and im just wanting to make the most amazing server ever. lol

item.title: Adding Curses Command
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

Hi i previously posted and topic for curses and I Vain I tried helping me with it and he got the command right its just when you type in ::curses it doesnt switch. Can anyone help me?
Heres the coding:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("curses")) { if (c.pkPoints > 199) { if (c.altarPrayed == 1) c.altarPrayed = 0; if (c.altarPrayed == 0) c.altarPrayed = 1; c.pkPoints -= 200; c.sendMessage("You lose 200 pk points for switching your curses."); } else { c.sendMessage("You need at least 200 pk points to do this."); return; } }

Read full topic
